attributes.action: Ban any kind of manditory vaccination public or private
attributes.additional_details: I would like the goverment to state legally that no private or pulic entity E.G. employers, shops, leisure industry, NHS (or and subsiduary or contractor) can enforce this and that anyone who does can be liable themselves of any negative out come from their actions to the individual and anyone affected by the individuals issues arising from this for their whole life.
attributes.background:
Having any vaccine should be the individuals choice and not down to an employer or goverment, i dont see any informed consent just pressure to take it with no one accepting liability.
This is to prevent any private or public entity from mandating any vaccine.

rejection.details:
It is already against the law for people to be required to undergo medical treatment, including vaccinations. The Coronavirus Act 2020 has not changed this.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Prevent any restrictions on those who refuse a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442

Do not implement Covid-19 Freedom Passes: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561818

Do not require health and social care workers to take covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842

Prohibit employers from requiring employees to have a Covid-19 vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575607
